item.description: As usual we will be eating, drinking, and trying new dishes together as a group, with plenty of conversation and laughs to go around. As always please bring cash to pay for food at the end so we don't have to spread the bill over credit cards! Thanks and I look forward to seeing everyone again in July!!
item.why: If you enjoy sushi and food in general, good conversation, drinks and fun....you

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: The Middle of CT Sushi August Meetup
